title: CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case Orange
descriptions:
Introducing the CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case in vibrant orange! This comprehensive tool set is perfect for small repairs and DIY projects, making it a must-have for DIY amateurs and avid handymen alike.

With a tool count of 39, this set includes all the essentials you need, such as a hammer, pliers, screwdrivers, and a tape measure. The tools are built to last, thanks to their heat-treated and chrome-plated finish, ensuring durability and corrosion resistance for long-lasting use.

The plastic toolbox storage case not only keeps your tools organized but also offers easy tool organization with its tool compartments. It is lightweight and features a convenient carrying handle, allowing you to take your tools wherever you go with ease.

This tool set is not only practical but also makes for a great gift idea. The vibrant orange color adds a pop of personality to your tool collection, making it a standout among the rest.
